description_text:
Hello,

 I'm writing to see if we can find a easier solution for both parties. My Order
ID: 111-5031868-2390644 of the 3 vam kit, power supply, and mounting kit
has resulted in two Vam units already malfunctioning. The third is
currently being used. I have already set up a return with Amazon but
haven't shipped my item back yet. Now I can just go through with the return
but I was hoping for just a simple exchange of the malfunctioning parts or
potential paying a slight upcharge for a Vam pro upgrade potentially.  I
just would hate to have to unmount all this from my pedals and ship it off
just to do it again potentially. Please let me know if there are any
options we can pursue besides doing a return and refund with Amazon.

Thank you,

Kyle Simpson
generalpatton71@gmail.com
Generalpatton71@yahoo.com
